attributes.action: Listen to General Public and do us a favour and not yourselves
attributes.additional_details:
sign this petition if you believe enough is enough with the current goverment.

in the past 3 years the weekly shop has risen from £20 to £45
The cost of fuel is at a phenominal high even thou there are stockpiles of reservers.
The current goverment spends more money giving it away to third world countries and wars we do not belong in. WHEN we are becoming the third world country.
I Would like to see the goverment survive on £700 a month with no benefits with the cost of living rising when will we get a minimum wage increase to cover the cost of living.
OR when will the people in power stop spending our money of which is not theres to spend everytime the goverment spends our money why dont they ASK US FIRST!!

if this country was run by working class people the bread and butter of this nation it wouldnt be such a bad idea if you havent had to scrape by on next to nothing you dont know the true value of money
